name: Ashura: Dark Reign
storyline: In the shadow of the crumbling remnants and debris of the Death Egg Mk1 on the mysterious Floating Island; Sonic, Tails, and Knuckles uncover a site pulsing with residual technological energies. Unbeknownst to their investigation amidst the twisted metal and shadowed ruins, will soon disturb a relic from the past, whose emergence threatens to unravel the very fabric of time and reality. As they delve into secrets long buried, they face choices that could change their lives and the world forever. As alliances shift and truths are unveiled, the adventure to save their future from the ashes of the past begins--where every action could tilt the balance of fate.
